title: Robbery victim fights back with pressure washer wand
text:
If somebody is holding a pressure washer wand, it's not a good idea to try and rob them.
According to authorities, on Thursday, 24-year-old Nancy Blair walked up to a man and implied she had a gun. She then allegedly stated, "Give me your keys or I'm gonna kill you."
The man chose a different option. He struck her multiple times with the pressure washer wand.
Blair ran from the scene, but was caught a short time later and arrested.
After the incident took place, the victim noticed his truck door was partially open and he was missing a pack of cigarettes. Police say they found the cigarettes on Blair.
Blair was taken to the Tulsa County Jail.
[Information compiled from arrest and booking report]
